# mapView(_:regionDidChangeAnimated:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate when the region the map view is displaying changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func mapView(_ mapView: MKMapView, regionDidChangeAnimated animated: Bool)
```

## Parameters

- **mapView**: The map view with the visible region that changes.
- **animated**: If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the map view animates the change to the new region.

## Discussion

The map view calls this method at the end of a change to the map’s visible region.

## Responding to map position changes

- **mapView(_:regionWillChangeAnimated:)**: Tells the delegate when the region the map view is displaying is about to change.
- **mapViewDidChangeVisibleRegion(_:)**: Tells the delegate when the map view’s visible region changes.
